name: RUN AMELIA RUN
description:
YOU'RE AMELIA, A GIRL THAT LIVES IN THE SECTOR C468PLB. ONE DAY A PACKAGE CONTAINING AN EVIL LASER IS DELIVERED TO YOU. ALL YOU CAN DO IS  RUN, SO RUN AMELIA, RUN!

THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE SECOND CAXIAS GAMEJAM.
